At first we were talking about how great this chapter is, and now you guys are telling me that I'm a sexist asshole. Could we just leave the job of characters developments to michiking, and patiently waiting for the next chapter?

@linkjames24 nothing's wrong with it. But Hinata and Karen is a different story, although Hinata loves Shion more, Hinata is still in a "relationship" with Karen (They've lasted from third year of high school 'till colege even with Shion's involvement, who's to say Karen doesn't agree with Shion becoming Hinata's mistress or something). Besides, who's to say Hinata hasn't met Karen's parents? I mean, a maid of their household is assigned to a different house, as wealthy as you are, you would know if a maid you employed and paid isn't working in your home.

So what if Shion slept with someone else? So did Hinata with Karen. And now they're focused almost exclusively on each other. Stop being sexist assholes to women assuming they can only have sex with one man and grow the fuck up.

Well, if you want to have another doujin of Shion from our lord and savior michiking, first you'll have to wait for the upcoming release of COMIC Kairakuten, which includes a ton of doujins from different artists. Then, check out the book's contents to see whether or not michiking has any doujin published, and whether the work belongs to the "Shujuu" series that you have been waiting for. If not, please patiently wait for the next Kairakuten book. After that, wait for another one or two months for the translation groups to do their job, and you're ready to go.

Well, so who will Hinata choose? As he had previously stated that he loves Shion more than Karen in the first chapter, and later, when he decided to live by himself after entering college, the person who chose to be around to help him was not Karen but Shion.


Everyday I kinda daydreaming of how the story would continue if Hinata choose Shion instead of Karen and leave the Enjouji family.
I actually love Michiking doesn't shy from that kind of stuff and i think it gave depth to her character.

Also i have been thinking since Shion actually have experience before she fuck Hinata judging by her demeanor on the first chapter, and since she is a maid of a household chance of her meeting other people outside is small. So she is probably being trained by the true master of that household. I wish we got chapter of her first time or maybe saw her getting fuck by her master after this tbh

Well its not like i wanted to focus on that pathetic Shinji as well www. However, it shows that Shion is willing to fuck other man if the situation arise. What's not to say that she would not fuck another even after she repeatedly say she love Hinata.
and also, why was the colored version of Shujuu Dreaming (2017) being the first part of the series while its timeline and plot makes it the direct prequel of  the B&W Shujuu Dreaming (2019) ?

@Sitonaiii: Thanks for the detailed summary. It was hard to express those in words.
BTW, Shinji did not fuck Shion. Shion has already dedicated her love for Hinata in Shujuu Dreaming (B&W).

The "Shujuu" series's timeline:

• first part - Shujuu Triangle:  our MC Hinata was a high schooler when Karen, his supposed future "significant other" confessed him, and later he developed a three-person relationship along with Karen's tsundere maid, named Shion.
• second part - Shujuu Rendezvous: Hinata was supposed to have his first date with Karen, but later found out he will go with Shion instead.
• third part - Shujuu Emotion: Hinata decided to go to Karen's place as she had suggested to study for their college entrance exam (and later have sex with Shion and Sakurako)
• fourth and fifth part - Shujuu Dreaming:
+ the b&w version: 
Hinata has entered college, and decided that he will try to live by himself. Shion now becomes Hinata's personal maid, and she resides in his house (she has sex with a sleeping Hinata every night, while secretly confessing her love for Hinata).
+ the colored version: Hinata's dream of Shion "confessing" her love every night

As for people who wondering did Shinji fucked Shion in the second part of the #1 story or not. I'd say not. Since the one doing that was Sakurako. Shion did did the footjob, blowjob, let Shinji drinked her pee and licked her breast though. As the story goes, the only one who have fucked Shion is Hinata (some hopes for those vanillafags I guess?).

For those who don't know about the story. There're 3 main characters in this series: - Karen: The long black hair one, appeared in the #1 story. The main female protagonist (should be) but her role pretty much got taken by Shion. She loves Hinata who is the main protagonist of the story. - Shion: Blue-eyes white hair maid. Karen's personal maid. Karen asked Shion to make Hinata fall for her, but Hinata confess that he loves Shion instead, and the feelings are mutual for Shion too. (Yep pretty much like a NTR). - Hinata: The main male protagonist appeared in the first part of #1 story and also in every sequel. He loves Shion...... *Aside from the 3 above, there're also 2 notable side characters: - Shinji: Appeared in the second part of the #1 story, he has a personal maid name Sakurako (totally not Fate reference). He always trick and dominate her. - Sakurako: Shinji's personal maid and Shion's precious subordinate. Shion helped Sakurako to dominate Shinji in second part of the #1 story
